summary:

profile_positions.description:
•	Managing properties for owners and partners with main focus on real estate.

profile_positions.title: Chief Operations Officer and Founder
Chief Operations Officer chez Soccorritore Rescuer

profile_positions.description:
•	Acted as first point of contact across Europe, Africa, Canada and Asian in facilitating the listing of properties on the company’s website. The milestone of more than 800,000 listed properties set for the second quarter of 2015 was reached. 
•	Reduced fraud at a record low of about 1% through intense due diligence.
•	Constant team and departmental top performer.
•	Raised partner awareness tremendously via orientation on their respective tax categories, legal documents and country rules.
•	Reviewing properties listed on the website, giving feedback to senior colleagues for appropriate follow up and liaising with other departments such as Credit Control, Content, Accommodation Service, and Fraud etc in defining the status of the said properties.
profile_positions.title: Partner Support Cordinator

profile_positions.description:
•	Advocacy via a project aimed at showcasing the importance of premium subsidy in health insurance to the World Bank, Global Fund, USAID, EU, DFID, Amsterdam Dinner, Dutch Ministry of Foreign Affairs, the Gates Foundation and governments of beneficiary countries. This led to the continuous funding of premium subsidy by these donors.
•	Timely follow up and frequent updates with donors and stakeholders, led to effective program management and planning and in securing additional funding.
•	Raised US$ 2 million by being instrumental in the development of a program at the Saving Lives at Birth award, a consortium of USAID, UKAID, Grand Challenges Canada, Gates Foundation and the Norwegian Ministry of Foreign Affairs.
•	Excellent proposal writing skills, with a proposal voted as the best at the innovation ventures award in Washington DC in August 2014, securing funding from a faith base organisation and several other proposals written to the European Union.

•	Drafted and reviewed legal documents such as memoranda of understanding, contracts and partnership agreements and ensured strict compliance with statutory and donor requirements.
